predictedIssues.issue: Test failures after moving due to hard-coded paths or dependencies
predictedIssues.mitigation: Update tests to use dynamic import paths and mock external dependencies accurately before migration.

predictedIssues.issue: Import resolution failures due to moved UI components
predictedIssues.mitigation: Use module resolution configurations or update import paths before migration.

predictedIssues.issue: Missing exports in components leading to build failures
predictedIssues.mitigation: Perform a static code analysis to identify and fix missing exports before migration.

predictedIssues.issue: Type errors from moved files due to inconsistent typing across components and domain logic
predictedIssues.mitigation: Standardize type definitions and interfaces before migration. Ensure all components and business logic use these standardized types.

predictedIssues.issue: Circular dependencies between components and business logic
predictedIssues.mitigation: Refactor code to remove circular dependencies before starting the migration. Introduce intermediary abstractions if necessary.
